heading: Forgotten Depths Dungeon Guide
content: Forgotten Depths has the easy monster families Skeletons and Zombies, making the walk through the dungeon a breeze. The is here for Sorcerers, and it's a great Codex of Power aspect to pick up early on in your season journey. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
